books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by Kyle Mills
books.description: Flynn’s character, the C.I.A. operative Mitch Rapp, uncovers a dangerous Russian plot. Flynn died in 2013.
books.name: VINCE FLYNN: ORDER TO KILL

books.author: by Jodi Picoult
books.description: A medical crisis entangles a black nurse, a white supremacist father and a white lawyer.
books.name: SMALL GREAT THINGS

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: A man who became a single father when his marriage and business collapsed learns to take a chance on a new love.
books.name: TWO BY TWO

books.author: by Fredrik Backman
books.description: A curmudgeon's gruff exterior masks a generosity of spirit. Originally published in Sweden in 2014.
books.name: A MAN CALLED OVE

books.author: by Laurell K. Hamilton
books.description: The vampire hunter Anita Blake, her friend Edward and her servant Damian travel to Ireland to battle an unusual vampire infestation.
books.name: CRIMSON DEATH

books.author: by Harlan Coben
books.description: Myron Bolitar and his friend Win locate a boy who was kidnapped 10 years earlier; the 11th Myron Bolitar novel.
books.name: HOME

books.author: by Dan Brown
books.description: The symbologist Robert Langdon, on the run in Florence, must decipher a series of codes created by a Dante-loving scientist.
books.name: INFERNO

books.author: by Ann Patchett
books.description: Five decades in the lives of two families — parents, children, siblings, stepchildren — remade by divorce.
books.name: COMMONWEALTH

books.author: by James Patterson and Kathryn Fox
books.description: Private Sydney's elite team looks for a seemingly untraceable man.
books.name: MISSING

books.author: by Alexander McCall Smith
books.description: In the 17th installment of the No. 1 Ladies’ Detective Agency series, Precious Ramotswe and Grace Makutski help a Canadian woman find the nursemaid who raised her in Botswana.
books.name: PRECIOUS AND GRACE

books.author: by Tana French
books.description: In the sixth Dublin Murder Squad novel, Detective Antoinette Conway confronts a case that is more complicated than it appears.
books.name: THE TRESPASSER

books.author: by M. L. Stedman
books.description: An Australian lighthouse keeper and his wife decide to keep a baby who has washed ashore.
books.name: THE LIGHT BETWEEN OCEANS

books.author: by James Patterson and Maxine Paetro
books.description: The story of a (woman) doctor who, after a life of service and suffering, decides to become a Catholic priest.
books.name: WOMAN OF GOD

books.author: by Maria Semple
books.description: A calamitous day in the life of a cynical Seattle transplant from the author of “Where’d You Go, Bernadette.”
books.name: TODAY WILL BE DIFFERENT
